page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE 1985
page.content: My name is Alexandra Merrick,I live at 1.Spinney Drive and I go to Cheswick Green Primary School,I am in my fourth year.My older sister,Catherine,goes to Alderbrook Comprehensive.I will be going to Alderbrook in September,I cannot wait. My Mum and Dad both work full time.My Mum works at a place called P.E. Consulting Group. My Dad works for Velan Valves and is based at home.Dad sometimes has to go away for a few days. I have three pets,one is a cat called Benjamin,another is a rabbit called Bubbles.Bubbles shares a cage with a guinea-pig called Squeak. I am really happy living with my family,we have lots of fun together.
